name: Donut Drop Delivery
description:
Xbox Controller: Left stick to move, A to shoot, y to slow down, b to drop donut

Keyboard: W,A,S,D to move, left click to shoot, space to slow down, right click to drop donut

Made for MiniJam 56 : Sky

Theme: Warzone and Donut

In this  low poly retro inspired game, you play the role of an average Doughnut Delivery boy who has been ordered to deliver to an active war-zone.  You are not supposed to be there. Good luck.
